nodes.text: Commander of Organic Training was a title used by Separatist General Horn Ambigene during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic. The title was given to Ambigene by the Confederacy's leader, Count Dooku, after he stationed Ambigene on the planet Pzandias following the Bryx sector's secession from the Republic. While on Pzandias, Ambigene was tasked with teaching fellow Separatists how to best keep their homeworlds free from the Republic.

The title of Commander of Organic Training was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
